python {
    llm = Llama(
        model_path="DeepSeek-R1-Distill-Qwen-7B-Q4_K_M.gguf",
        verbose=False
    )

    output = llm(
        f"<｜User｜>What is 1+1?<｜Assistant｜>",
        max_tokens=256,
        seed=-1,
        temperature=0.7
    )["choices"][0]["text"].strip()

    with open("output/output.txt", "w") as f:
        f.write(output)

    print(output)
}
